proposal: Diving into DeFi doesn't have to be like finding a needle in a haystack. With your one-click passive income solution and curated onchain vaults, you're simplifying the complex world of decentralized asset management. Congrats on gathering 59 holders in the ETH network! If you're looking to expand your community's toolkit, our DEX and Lottery platforms could be the perfect match, allowing anyone to deploy and share in the revenue. Let's make DeFi as easy as pie together.
